name: Les Quatre Alices
description:
A young girl walks in a dark forest.
She meets a mysterious red-haired teenager near a campfire.
The teenager tells her a story.
A story that is far too weird to be true, and yet...Features* Les Quatre Alices | The Four Alices is a short visual novel made in RPG MAKER MV, originally written in Quebec French.

* There is 4 Endings (3 Bad, 1 Good) in total.
* It has the peculiarity of having heroines with an ASD, for Autistic Spectrum Disorder.
* Her author, the Quebecois Mia Blais-Côté, also has an ASD.
* There will be Trading Cards in the future (with the new Steam Cards Rule).
